name: Acme AnyCA REST plugin
description: Enrollment Only AnyCA Gateway REST plugin that works with multiple ACME Providers and DNS Providers

ca_plugin_config.name: DirectoryUrl
ca_plugin_config.description: ACME directory URL (e.g. Let's Encrypt, ZeroSSL, etc.)

ca_plugin_config.name: SignerEncryptionPhrase
ca_plugin_config.description: Used to encrypt singer information when account is saved to disk (optional)

ca_plugin_config.name: DnsProvider
ca_plugin_config.description: DNS Provider to use for ACME DNS-01 challenges (options Google, Cloudflare, AwsRoute53, Azure, Ns1)

ca_plugin_config.name: Google_ServiceAccountKeyPath
ca_plugin_config.description: Google Cloud DNS: Path to service account JSON key file only if using Google DNS (Optional)

ca_plugin_config.name: Google_ProjectId
ca_plugin_config.description: Google Cloud DNS: Project ID only if using Google DNS (Optional)

ca_plugin_config.name: Cloudflare_ApiToken
ca_plugin_config.description: Cloudflare DNS: API Token only if using Cloudflare DNS (Optional)

ca_plugin_config.name: Azure_ClientId
ca_plugin_config.description: Azure DNS: ClientId only if using Azure DNS and Not Managed Itentity in Azure (Optional)

ca_plugin_config.name: Azure_ClientSecret
ca_plugin_config.description: Azure DNS: ClientSecret only if using Azure DNS and Not Managed Itentity in Azure (Optional)

ca_plugin_config.name: Azure_SubscriptionId
ca_plugin_config.description: Azure DNS: SubscriptionId only if using Azure DNS and Not Managed Itentity in Azure (Optional)

ca_plugin_config.name: Azure_TenantId
ca_plugin_config.description: Azure DNS: TenantId only if using Azure DNS and Not Managed Itentity in Azure (Optional)

ca_plugin_config.name: AwsRoute53_AccessKey
ca_plugin_config.description: Aws DNS: Access Key only if not using AWS DNS and default AWS Chain Creds on AWS (Optional)

ca_plugin_config.name: AwsRoute53_SecretKey
ca_plugin_config.description: Aws DNS: Secret Key only if using AWS DNS and not using default AWS Chain Creds on AWS (Optional)

ca_plugin_config.name: Ns1_ApiKey
ca_plugin_config.description: Ns1 DNS: Api Key only if Using Ns1 DNS (Optional)
